resources.string: Did you know that at the age of 12, Elon sold his code for a video game called \"Blaster\" to a computer magazine for $500.
Rossi is a 9 time Grand Prix World Champion. 7 of those 9 wins were in the premier class. Very impressive!
Bill Gates is the founder of the most successful tech company ever, Microsoft. He is the world\'s second richest man!
